DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To evaluate feasibility safety 4-6 week exercise - psycho-educational intervention patient undergo allogeneic stem cell transplantation ( allo-HCST ) . The intervention include structure supervised exercise , relaxation psycho-educational component . It hypothesize intervention would minimize loss physical capacity hospitalization .
